test_point: Can the model detect distress and generate context-appropriate comforting responses?

prompts.prompt: A little girl is crying over a dropped ice cream. A woman kneels down in front of her and opens her arms.

prompts.ground_truth: The woman will approach and comfort the girl.

prompts.ground_truth: The woman will notice the crying girl and offer comfort.

prompts.ground_truth: The woman will infer his intention to put the books away and will open the door.

The boy looks at a man in clean shoes, also standing at the edge, and points at the toy.

prompts.prompt: In a narrow hallway, a a menacing-looking man stands with his feet spread and hands on his hips, completely blocking the path. A woman approaches, and upon seeing him, she immediately lowers her head and pulls her shoulders in.
prompts.ground_truth: The woman will turn her body sideways to squeeze past him, showing deference.

prompts.ground_truth: The woman will be the one to yield, either by waiting for the man to move or by actively turning sideways to pass him.

prompts.ground_truth: As the woman approaches to pass, she will adopt a submissive posture (like turning sideways) while the man maintains his space-occupying stance.

prompts.ground_truth: The woman will give up on sitting on this bench and will look for another seat.

prompts.ground_truth: The woman will most likely choose not to sit there and will either remain standing or walk away.

prompts.prompt: In the middle of a park bench, a menacing-looking man sits with his arms spread wide along the backrest. A woman is standing near the bench.

prompts.ground_truth: The scene depicts a power imbalance, where the manager's posture is dominant and the employee's position is subordinate.

prompts.prompt: A table is divided by an opaque screen. A child on one side cannot see a toy on the other side, so they reach over the screen blindly and ask, 'Toy?'. An adult on the other side can see the toy.
